com.example.painintheass.GameLogic.Units

Class Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.painintheass.GameLogic.Units.Unit
      • com.example.painintheass.GameLogic.Units.Knight

  • public class Knight
extends Unit
    Represents a Knight unit. Weak against magic, strong against physical attacks.
